title: Why ranked system is so evil.
body: I feel like ranked game is not really good for your mental health. They usually make you win a couple of games and get you to promo when you start playing first 3 hours. Then riot makrs you keep losing games and leave me broken hearted after playing for 10 hours. I never let myself get addicted to thinhs except tobaccos but I think ranked games are way more evil than pockey machines in the casino. I dont know who invented this system but they should make it +18 and should warn ppl so they dont waste time. Riot ur evil and shoud be punished by justice for inventing this system. Anyone know number for help.lines ?
